summary: An email from October 10, 2020, referencing an attached PDF file named '2006-08-15JEGE_MANIFESTic_HYPERION_MANIFEST.pdf', which is described as a portion of the 'long lost passenger manifests' related to Jeffrey Epstein. The email is addressed to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Flight Manifest Creation
events.description: A passenger manifest for a flight associated with Jeffrey Epstein was created, as indicated by the attached PDF filename.

events.title: Email Transmission of Flight Manifest
events.description: An email was sent containing an attachment described as a portion of the 'long lost passenger manifests' related to Jeffrey Epstein, addressed to a federal prosecutor.

keyFacts: A document described as a portion of the 'long lost passenger manifests' related to Jeffrey Epstein was transmitted via email in October 2020.
The attached manifest file is dated August 15, 2006.
The email was directed to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, indicating the document was part of an official investigation or legal proceeding.
The filename '2006-08-15JEGE_MANIFESTic_HYPERION_MANIFEST.pdf' suggests the manifest is for a flight on the aircraft 'Hyperion'.
